algorithm_technique: Iterate through target, generating all possible intermediate strings by appending characters up to the target character.
problem_summary_simple: Generate all strings that can be formed by appending characters or cycling the last character, to reach the target string.
problem_summary_technical: Constructs all intermediate strings by appending characters up to the target character at each position, using string slicing and character manipulation.
key_insights: The problem requires generating all possible states, not just the final target.
The core idea is to consider all valid character transitions at each position.
The solution leverages Python's list comprehensions for concise generation.
